content: dpn next row ws k1 sl1 pwise wyif to end and the purl sts onto the spare dpn there should be 7 sts on each needle repeat last two row 3 more times the last wrapped st should be 1 st from the end on the rs row break yarn leaving a tail approximately 46cm / 18 inches long thread tail onto yarn needle and graft sts next row rs k1 sl1 pwise wyif to wrapped st pick up together wrap and knit it with its st sl1 pwise wyif next row ws k1 sl1 pwise wyif to end finishing weave in ends and block flat 3 the little ribbon scarf can be worn in so many different ways if you knit little ribbon please share on social media #littleribbonscarf also please don t forget to favourite this pattern over on ravelry when you download it <3 ©ribbon version 1 kiyomi burgin 2025 this pattern has been tech edited pattern is meant as a guide only the designer takes no responsibility for variations in the final results for personal use only text charts and images cannot be reproduced or distributed without author consent if you obtained this pattern for free please consider purchasing another pattern at kshandknitdesign com 4
